title: When did Florence Nightingale became a nurse? - Quora

response.answer_text: Nightingale underwent the first of several experiences that she believed were calls from God in February 1837 while at enbley park, prompting a strong desire to devote her life to the service of others. On 22 August 1853, Nightingale took the post of superintendent at the Institute for the Care of Sick Gentlewomen, London, a position she held until October 1854. Florence Nightingale's most famous contribution came during the crimean war which she'd joined on 21 October 1854.
